title: Create Welcome Page with Curtain Scene
description:
New single-screen welcome page with Three.js curtain animation

Visual elements:
- Full-viewport Three.js canvas with curtain panels
- Centered overlay: App title 'CATETIN', tagline, 'Mulai Menulis' button

Animation flow:
1. User clicks 'Mulai Menulis'
2. Check auth state via Clerk useAuth
3. If not signed in → Clerk modal → on success continue
4. Trigger curtain-parting animation (1-2 seconds)
5. Navigate to /refleksi at animation midpoint

Fallbacks:
- If WebGL not supported → CSS fade transition
- If Three.js fails to load → direct navigate
